entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain or snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain in areas south of Fort McMurray overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
